title: Deadpool & Wolverine: How to Watch the Marvel Blockbuster Online
description: Deadpool & Wolverine will soon begin streaming. Here’s everything you need to know about watching the superhero movie online from home. author: Claire Franken
excerpt: Here's where to watch 'Deadpool and Wolverine' at home — get streaming, digital and DVD/Blu-ray release details.
text: Deadpool & Wolverine will soon begin streaming. Here’s everything you need to know about watching the superhero movie online from home. The film — which became the MCU’s fifth highest-grossing domestic release of all-time — follows Deadpool (played by Ryan Reynolds) and Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) as they team up to face an existential threat. Keep scrolling to find out everything you need to know about Deadpool & Wolverine’s streaming, digital and Blu-ray/DVD release. Where Can I Watch Deadpool & Wolverine at Home? Deadpool & Wolverine will hit Disney Plus on Tuesday, Nov. 12. Ahead of its official streaming release, you can sign up for Disney Plus below for $7.99/month. Deadpool & Wolverine is available to purchase digitally on Prime Video for just $19.99, instead of its regular $29.99. (Customers do not need a Prime Video or Amazon Prime membership to purchase Deadpool & Wolverine online.) Where Can I Watch Deadpool & Wolverine at Home? Blu-ray/DVD/4K If you don’t want to purchase a digital copy of the Disney movie, you can snag a physical copy on Blu-ray, DVD or 4K on Amazon. How to Watch Deadpool & Wolverine Online for Free There currently isn’t a way to watch Deadpool & Wolverine online for free. Keep checking back here for all the latest updates. What Is Deadpool & Wolverine About? The film follows Wade Wilson (Reynolds) as he “toils away in civilian life, his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. When his home world faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit up again with an even more reluctantlier… reluctanter? Reluctantest? He must convince a reluctant Wolverine (Jackman) to… oh hell, just watch the movie.” The movie also stars — SURPRISE/”SURPRISE” CAMEOS AHEAD! — Emma Corrin as Cassandra Nova, Matthew Macfadyen as Mr. Paradox, Dafne Keen as Laura/X-23, Jon Favreau as Happy Hogan, Morena Baccarin as Vanessa, Rob Delaney as Peter, Leslie Uggams as Blind Al, Karan Soni as Dopinder, Jennifer Garner as Elektra, Wesley Snipes as Blade, Channing Tatum as Gambit and Chris Evans as Johnny Storm. html:
Deadpool & Wolverine will soon begin streaming. Here’s everything you need to know about watching the superhero movie online from home.

The film — which became the MCU’s fifth highest-grossing domestic release of all-time — follows Deadpool (played by Ryan Reynolds) and Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) as they team up to face an existential threat.

Keep scrolling to find out everything you need to know about Deadpool & Wolverine’s streaming, digital and Blu-ray/DVD release.

Where Can I Watch Deadpool & Wolverine at Home?

Deadpool & Wolverine will hit Disney Plus on Tuesday, Nov. 12. Ahead of its official streaming release, you can sign up for Disney Plus below for $7.99/month.

Deadpool & Wolverine is available to purchase digitally on Prime Video for just $19.99, instead of its regular $29.99. (Customers do not need a Prime Video or Amazon Prime membership to purchase Deadpool & Wolverine online.)

Where Can I Watch Deadpool & Wolverine at Home? Blu-ray/DVD/4K

If you don’t want to purchase a digital copy of the Disney movie, you can snag a physical copy on Blu-ray, DVD or 4K on Amazon.

How to Watch Deadpool & Wolverine Online for Free

There currently isn’t a way to watch Deadpool & Wolverine online for free. Keep checking back here for all the latest updates.

What Is Deadpool & Wolverine About?

The film follows Wade Wilson (Reynolds) as he “toils away in civilian life, his days as the morally flexible mercenary, Deadpool, behind him. When his home world faces an existential threat, Wade must reluctantly suit up again with an even more reluctantlier… reluctanter? Reluctantest? He must convince a reluctant Wolverine (Jackman) to… oh hell, just watch the movie.”

The movie also stars — SURPRISE/”SURPRISE” CAMEOS AHEAD! — Emma Corrin as Cassandra Nova, Matthew Macfadyen as Mr. Paradox, Dafne Keen as Laura/X-23, Jon Favreau as Happy Hogan, Morena Baccarin as Vanessa, Rob Delaney as Peter, Leslie Uggams as Blind Al, Karan Soni as Dopinder, Jennifer Garner as Elektra, Wesley Snipes as Blade, Channing Tatum as Gambit and Chris Evans as Johnny Storm.
